document.full_text: nevada regulators have approved the first marketing agreement between a las vegas hotel and casino company and an overseas internet gambling concern, a move welcomed by advocates for legalized online gambling in the united states.
document.title: nevada regulators back caesars' internet gambling gambit
lines_and_colors: nevada regulators have approved the first marketing agreement between a las vegas hotel and casino company and an overseas internet gambling concern, a move welcomed by advocates for legalized online gambling in the united states.
